title: Enforce pure white background across all pages and sections

requirements.text: Ensure the site renders a pure white page background everywhere, including all sections, header/footer areas, and full-bleed hero backgrounds, with no section-level tinted/gray backgrounds, gradients, or full-screen background images that make the page appear non-white.
acceptanceCriteria: When scrolling through the entire site, no section uses tinted backgrounds (e.g., bg-muted/*) or gradient backgrounds that visually change the page background away from white.
The hero section does not use a full-bleed background image or overlay that makes the page background appear non-white; the hero background appears white like the rest of the page.
Header and footer backgrounds appear white (no muted/tinted backgrounds) while maintaining readable text contrast.
Global base backgrounds remain white for html/body/#root in light mode.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Adding new pages/routes or changing site structure beyond background styling.
Implementing backend changes (no backend work required).
